title: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. In the 'Export' dialog window, select both projects created earlier.
2. Give the zip file a name (such as test.zip) and begin export to a zip file.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up stating that problems were encountered during export. The error message specifically mentions the file with the same name in project 2 as the problem.
EB: The export should successfully create a zip file containing all selected files without encountering any errors.
SR:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Give the zip file a name.
4. Click on the 'Export' button to begin the export process.
5. Verify that a zip file is created successfully without any error messages.
